data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Raul likes to sing in the shower. He ____ not ____ good ____ singing, but ____ likes ____ sing. He ____ very ____ in ____ morning; often, he ____ up ____ 6 AM. Sometimes, he wakes up his wife when he sings.
data.partBlankContent: Raul likes to sing in the shower. He i_ not ve__ good a_ singing, but h_ likes t_ sing. He sho____ very ea___ in t__ morning; often, he wa___ up bef___ 6 AM. Sometimes, he wakes up his wife when he sings.
data.fullContent: Raul likes to sing in the shower. He is not very good at singing, but he likes to sing. He showers very early in the morning; often, he wakes up before 6 AM. Sometimes, he wakes up his wife when he sings.
data.answer: 劳尔喜欢在淋浴时唱歌。他不太擅长唱歌，但他喜欢唱歌。他一大早就洗澡;他经常在早上6点前醒来。有时，他唱歌会吵醒他的妻子。
